heading: How Udelo works?
headingText: Very easy to use app. With these few steps, you are good to start earning money/get your parcels delivered.

workData.title: Install the App
workData.content: Install the pp from either Appstore or google playstore.?

workData.title: Setup your profile
workData.content: Create an account and setup your payment to be able to accept funds after delivery of packages.

workData.title: Enjoy the features!
workData.content: Enjoy the amazing features we have provided to earn money.
